foreignData.name: Chiot généreux
foreignData.text:
Vigilance
À chaque fois qu'au moins un marqueur +1/+1 est mis sur le Chiot généreux, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur chaque autre créature que vous contrôlez. Cette capacité ne se déclenche qu'une seule fois par tour.

Wachsamkeit

foreignData.flavorText: Comunicano con il linguaggio universale dei bocconcini.

foreignData.name: Cachorro generoso

Vigilancia.

mainBoard.name: Generous Pup
mainBoard.originalText:
Vigilance
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Generous Pup, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.

rulings.text: Generous Pup's last ability puts only one +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control, no matter how many +1/+1 counters were put on Generous Pup.

mainBoard.text:
Vigilance
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.

foreignData.name: Ajani, adversaire des tyrans
foreignData.text:
+1: Ciblez jusqu'à deux créatures. Mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur chacune d'elles.
-2: Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière une carte de créature ciblée avec une valeur de mana inférieure ou égale à 2.
-7: Vous gagnez un emblème avec « Au début de votre étape de fin, créez trois jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Chat avec le lien de vie. »

foreignData.name: Ajani, Widersacher der Tyrannen
foreignData.text:
+1: Lege je eine +1/+1-Marke auf bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl.

−7: Du erhältst ein Emblem mit „Zu Beginn deines Endsegments erzeugst du drei 1/1 weiße Katze-Kreaturenspielsteine mit Lebensverknüpfung."

foreignData.name: Ajani, Avversario dei Tiranni
foreignData.text:
+1: Scegli fino a due creature bersaglio. Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su ciascuna di esse.

−7: Ottieni un emblema con "All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, crea tre pedine creatura Felino 1/1 bianche con legame vitale".

mainBoard.name: Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants
mainBoard.originalText:

rulings.text: If a card in your graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

foreignData.name: Urdnan, guerrier de Dromoka
foreignData.text:
Quand Urdnan, guerrier de Dromola arrive, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur une créature ciblée.
À chaque fois que vous attaquez, une créature attaquante ciblée avec un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle acquiert l'initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour. Si cette créature a au moins deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur elle, elle acquiert la double initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour à la place.

foreignData.name: Urdnan, Dromoka-Krieger
foreignData.text:
Wenn Urdnan, Dromoka-Krieger, ins Spiel kommt, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
Immer wenn du angreifst, erhält eine angreifende Kreatur deiner Wahl, auf der eine +1/+1-Marke liegt, Erstschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges. Falls auf jener Kreatur zwei oder mehr +1/+1-Marken liegen, erhält sie stattdessen Doppelschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Urdnan, Guerriero Dromoka
foreignData.text:
Quando Urdnan, Guerriero Dromoka entra, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio.
Ogniqualvolta attacchi, una creatura attaccante bersaglio con un segnalino +1/+1 ha attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno. Se quella creatura ha due o più segnalini +1/+1, ha invece doppio attacco fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: ドロモカの戦士、ウルドナン
foreignData.text:
ドロモカの戦士、ウルドナンが戦場に出たとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。
あなたが攻撃するたび、＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれている攻撃クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは先制攻撃を得る。そのクリーチャーの上に２個以上の＋１/＋１カウンターがあるなら、代わりに、ターン終了時まで、それは二段攻撃を得る。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・戦士

foreignData.name: Urdnan, guerrero de Drómoka
foreignData.text:
Cuando Urdnan, guerrero de Drómoka entre, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre la criatura objetivo.
Siempre que ataques, la criatura atacante objetivo con un contador +1/+1 sobre ella gana la habilidad de dañar primero hasta el final del turno. Si esa criatura tiene dos o más contadores +1/+1 sobre ella, en vez de eso, gana la habilidad de dañar dos veces hasta el final del turno.

mainBoard.name: Urdnan, Dromoka Warrior
mainBoard.originalText:
When Urdnan, Dromoka Warrior enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Whenever you attack, target attacking creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains first strike until end of turn. If that creature has two or more +1/+1 counters on it, it gains double strike until end of turn instead.

mainBoard.name: Banishing Light
mainBoard.originalText: When Banishing Light enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners' graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist. When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled.
If Banishing Light leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the target permanent won't be exiled.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is exiled this way, its owner chooses what it will enchant as it returns to the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn't target anything (so it could be attached to a permanent with shroud, for example), but the Aura's enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can't legally be attached to anything, it remains in exile for the rest of the game.

Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist. When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled.
If Banishing Light leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the target permanent won’t be exiled.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is exiled this way, its owner chooses what it will enchant as it returns to the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything (so it could be attached to a permanent an opponent controls with hexproof, for example), but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains in exile for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.name: Angelic Cub
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever Angelic Cub becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
As long as Angelic Cub has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it has flying.

rulings.text: Angelic Cub's first ability will resolve before the spell or ability that caused it to trigger.
If a spell or ability has one or more of its targets changed to Angelic Cub, Angelic Cub's first ability will trigger if it hasn't yet been the target of a spell or ability this turn.
If you create a copy of a spell on the stack and target Angelic Cub, Angelic Cub's first ability will trigger as long as it hasn't yet been the target of a spell or ability this turn.
